unnormalised: I saw the Q3 report; expenses are up by 15% compared to last year, mainly due to the Diwali bonus of Rs. 20,000 per employee. Revenue only grew by 8.2%, so we need to brainstorm ideas to cut costs or increase sales by the next fiscal year. Maybe a 5% discount on bulk orders?
normalised: I saw the Q-three report; expenses are up by fifteen percent compared to last year, mainly due to the Diwali bonus of rupee twenty thousand per employee. Revenue only grew by eight point two percent, so we need to brainstorm ideas to cut costs or increase sales by the next fiscal year. Maybe a five percent discount on bulk orders?
